Nov. 3, 1934 D Harrogate and District BBA Contest (Open)

Test Piece Contest
Recollections of Verdi [arr. Rimmer]
Horsforth, Leeds March contest - 1st Horsforth(Invincible), 2nd Saltaire(President) 3rd Guiseley. Hymn tune contest - 1st Horsforth, 2nd Saltaire, 3rd Yeadon. 8 bands competed.
Oct. 24, 2013, 11:59 a.m. Jan. 7, 2019, 3:47 p.m.

2 Wetherby and District Silver Arthur Garforth
